welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Nicholasville, where southern charm meets small-town hospitality! Get ready to experience our beautiful parks, delicious food, and welcoming community. We can't wait for you to explore and fall in love with our city."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Blue Grass Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Blue Grass Airport serves private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal for regional and low-cost airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: A newly constructed terminal for international flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
